required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of IBI318 in Participants With Advanced Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: To Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Initial Efficacy of IBI318 in Patients With Advanced Malignancy, Multicenter, IA/IB Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study is an open, multicenter, Ia/Ib phase study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and initial efficacy of IBI318 in the treatment of patients with advanced malignancy.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants experiencing dose-limiting toxicities (DLTs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 28 days within first dose in phase Ia

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants experiencing clinical and laboratory adverse events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 90 days post last dose

primary_outcome.measure: Number of all study participants who demonstrate a tumor response

secondary_outcome.measure: The area under the curve (AUC) of plasma concentration of drug against time after administration of IBI318
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 90 days post last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum concentration (Cmax) after first dose interval of IBI318
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 90 days post last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Time at which maximum concentration (Tmax) occurs for IBI318
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 90 days post last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: The half-life (t1/2) of IBI318 in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 90 days post last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Positive rate of ADA and Nab
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 90 days post last dose

intervention.description: 0.3mg Intravenous infusion, first day of first cycle and afterwards Q2W
